Release notes for Kendo UI Core v2016.1.226

Components

What's fixed

  • Compiled AMD modules no longer export `kendo`
  • minified scripts require "jquery.min" - they should require "jquery"
  • Wrong k-content background-color in Moonlight theme
  • Popup in IE11 is not positioned correctly when placed in a scrolled container (jQuery 1.12.0/2.2.0)
  • AMD module names are incorrect in the minified files available on CDN
  • Font icons are distorted when exporting to PDF
  • Checkboxes move scrollbar on parent container in IE / Chrome

AngularJS

What's fixed

  • Compile itemTemplate to the dataSource item
  • Widgets are not destroyed correctly during navigation via angular-ui-router
  • Widget with remote binding selects the first item and updates the model incorrectly on first load

Calendar

What's new

  • Support for different string formats for disableDates array

What's fixed

  • Missing styles for k-state-disabled in Nova theme
  • Content shrinks by 10px at the end of decade-year-month animations
  • Review interactive states in Calendar

ComboBox

What's new

  • Keep custom filters when filtration is not enabled

What's fixed

  • Widget triggers 'cascade' event twice on load
  • Widget sends filter value twice
  • Widget does not persist the selected value on virtual list scroll
  • Widget selects the custom option when initial value is provided

DataSource

What's new

  • Revert Model `dirty` state to its original value when set event is preventedi

What's fixed

  • Data is not in correct format after cancelChanges is called on offline DataSource and Model's field projection is used

DropDownList

What's new

  • Keep custom filters when filtration is not enabled

What's fixed

  • Do no throw an exception when optionLabelTemplate is defined
  • Widget with remote binding selects the first item and updates the model incorrectly on first load
  • Widget throws an exception when search in grouped list
  • Widget sends filter value twice
  • Widget does not persist the selected value on virtual list scroll
  • An item is not correctly selected in case the value is set synchronously to three cascading dropdownlists with server filtering enabled
  • DropDownList issues in Nova theme

Excel Export

What's fixed

  • Account for formatting when calculating autoWidth

Gantt

What's fixed

  • Error is thrown when "edit" event is prevented.

Globalization

What's new

  • Update kendo.culture.da-DK.js

What's fixed

  • Fixed decimal separators for Switzerland

MobileListView

What's fixed

  • The first item top border is missing in Nova theme
  • Incorrect label colors in the ios7 theme

MultiSelect

What's new

  • Keep custom filters when filtration is not enabled

What's fixed

  • Compile itemTemplate to the dataSource item

Notification

What's new

  • New showText method encodes HTML entities for better protection from XSS attacks

NumericTextBox

What's fixed

  • Wrong arrow hover state in NumericTextBox placed in editable Grid with Nova theme

PDF Export

What's new

  • Add TypeScript definition for kendo.pdf.defineFont

What's fixed

  • Text input content is offset with Bootstrap
  • Radio button loses its checked state after multi-page export

Pager

What's fixed

  • Wrong hover icon positioning in Pager prev/next buttons in adaptive mode under IE 10+

PivotGrid

What's fixed

  • 'Includes' filter treeview is empty when schema.data is defined
  • Widget does not display descending sorted tuples

ThemeBuilder

What's fixed

  • Chrome: Security exception when downloading theme

TimePicker

What's fixed

  • TimePicker does not scroll to the selected value in PopUp

ToolBar

What's fixed

  • Tool that is being shown through the API is not visible in the popup container
  • Hidden configuration option does not work for SplitButton
  • Overflow button is always visible when the ToolBar is used as ActionBar on mobile device

Window

What's new

  • Minimize / maximize events
